message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $150. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save a bit more. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $110 for the product.

I understand you're looking to save a bit more, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $130. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to save a bit more. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $115 for the product.

I understand you're still looking to save a bit more, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer the product to you for $125. It's a good price, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
I'm really close to my budget now. I'd like to make a final offer of $120 for the product.
